title: Update SKTouchHandler.cs to fix crash bug caused by passing incorrect parameter, added pressure and eraser handling
body:
Fixed crash bug where id was incorrectly passed instead pointer to evt.GetToolType().

**Description of Change**

- Changed parameter from id to pointer - bug introduced in previous pull request.
- Added pressure parameter for touch handling
- Added button handling to enable eraser in stylus input

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1211 

**API Changes**
- SkTouchEventArgs.Pressure float parameter has been added
- Constructor for SKTouchEventArgs() with overloaded pressure parameter

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
